communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Acknowledge setbacks, celebrate small steps, avoid preaching.

narratives.c_essay: I'm on a journey to leave behind harmful communities and am here to support others doing the same. As a social sciences student, I'm also juggling my Master's studies, which can be stressful. But sharing recovery steps, offering mutual support, and exchanging resources keeps me motivated. Pizza and sushi are my go-to comfort foods, helping me celebrate the small victories along the way.
narratives.p_intro: Hi, I'm recovery_0024_795c8d! I share my progress on leaving harmful communities and help others in their recovery. Let's acknowledge our setbacks, celebrate our small steps, and keep moving forward together!
